title: Recapture the Rapture launch with Gabor Mate, Dennis McKenna, Jamie Wheal & more
description:
This is a recording of the epic 'Recapture the Rapture' launch party to mark the publication of Jamie Wheal's new book, with a host of amazing speakers.

Check out the book here: https://www.recapturetherapture.com/

Adam Gazzaley - 10:50
Amanda Ravenhill - 14:19
Tyson Yunkaporta - 21:17
Dennis McKenna - 30:25
Jules Evans - 40:21
Rick Doblin - 53:05
Gabor Mate - 59:33
Julie Holland MD - 1:11:25
Matt Johnson - 1:18:45
Leah Song - 1:32:50
Greg Thomas - 1:39:30
Diane Musho Hamilton - 1:46:35
Douglas Rushkoff - 2:04:35
Daniel Schmachtenberger - 2:18:00
Brian Muraresku - 2:32:05

And for those who want to join upcoming Rebel Wisdom sessions with speakers including Dennis McKenna, check out our upcoming events here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/campfire-events
